quote: There is no escape — we pay for the violence of our ancestors.
author: Paul Muad'Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: He who can destroy a thing, controls a thing.
author: Paul Muad'Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: Long live the fighters!
author: Paul Muad’Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: My name is a killing word.
author: Paul Muad’Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: Father... father, the sleeper has awakened!
author: Paul Muad’Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: Now remember, walk without rhythm, and we won't attract the worm.
author: Paul Muad’Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: Are you suggesting the Duke's son is an animal?
author: Paul Muad’Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: I will bend like a reed in the wind.
author: Paul Muad’Dib Atreides
title: Dune

quote: I must rule with eye and claw — as the hawk among lesser birds.
author: Duke Leto Atreides
title: Dune

quote: I'll miss the sea. But a man needs new experiences. They jar something deep inside, allowing him to grow. Without change, something sleeps inside of us and seldom awakens. The sleeper must awaken.
author: Duke Leto Atreides
title: Dune

quote: The sleeper must awaken.
author: Duke Leto Atreides
title: Dune

quote: And how can this be? For he is the Kwisatz Haderach!
author: Alia Atreides
title: Dune

quote: Those sounds could be imitated.
author: Mentat Thufir Hawat
title: Dune

quote: Parting with friends is a sadness. A place is only a place.
author: Mentat Thufir Hawat
title: Dune

quote: Not in the mood? Mood's a thing for cattle and loveplay, not fighting!
author: Gurney Halleck
title: Dune

quote: If wishes were fishes, we'd all cast nets.
author: Gurney Halleck
title: Dune

quote: Good. The slow blade penetrates the shield... but, uh, look down. We'd have joined each other in death.
author: Gurney Halleck
title: Dune

quote: Soon we leave for Arrakis. Arrakis is real. The Harkonnens are real.
author: Gurney Halleck
title: Dune

quote: May the Hand of God be with you.
author: Duncan Idaho
title: Dune

quote: He shall know your ways as if born to them.
author: Dr. Liet-Kynes
title: Dune

quote: Bless the maker and his water, bless the coming and going of him, may his passing cleanse the world.
author: Dr. Liet-Kynes
title: Dune

quote: May thy knife chip and shatter.
author: Fremen saying of ill will against an adversary; Jamis to Paul before their duel
title: Dune

quote: To save one from a mistake is a gift of paradise.
author: Stilgar
title: Dune

quote: I would not have permitted you to harm my tribe.
author: Chani
title: Dune

quote: They tried and died.
author: Mother Gaius Helen Mohiam
title: Dune

quote: God created Arrakis to train the faithful.
author: The Wisdom of Muad'Dib by the Princess Irulan
title: Dune

quote: Vendetta, he says, using the ancient tongue. The art of kanly is still alive in the Universe.
author: Mentat Piter De Vries
title: Dune

quote: Take them to the desert as the traitor suggested. The worms will destroy the evidence. Their bodies must never be found.
author: Mentat Piter De Vries
title: Dune

quote: The Bene Gesserit witch must leave.
author: Guildsman
title: Dune

quote: Muad’Dib learned rapidly because his first training was in how to learn.
author: Frank Herbert - Dune
title: Dune
